name: Corner the Market
text: Control 4 planets that each have the same trait

name: Galvanize the People
text: Have a total of 6 tokens in your tactic and/or strategy pools.

name: Manipulate Galactic Law
text: Have 16 influence via trade goods and/or planets, exhausted or readied.

name: Found a Golden Age
text: Have 16 resources via trade goods and/or planets, exhausted or readied.

name: Centralize Galactic Trade
text: Have 10 trade goods

name: Revolutionize Warfare
text: Own 3 unit upgrade technologies

name: Master the Sciences
text: Own 6 non-unit upgrade technologies

name: Subdue the Galaxy
text: Control 8 planets in non-home systems

name: Form Galactic Brain Trust
text: Control 4 planets that have technology specialties

name: Rule Distant Lands
text: Control 2 planets that are each in or adjacent to a different, other player's home system

name: Push Boundaries
text: Control more planets than each of 2 of your neighbors

name: Reclaim Ancient Monuments
text: Control 3 planets that have attachments

name: Patrol Vast Territories
text: Have units in 4 systems that do not contain planets

name: Intimidate Council
text: Have units in 3 systems adjacent to Mecatol Rex

name: Construct Massive Cities
text: Have 5 or more structures

name: Become a Legend
text: Have units in 3 systems that contain legendary planets, Mecatol Rex, or anomalies

name: Command and Armada
text: Have 6 or more non-fighter ships in one system

name: Achieve Supremacy
text: Have your flagship or a war sun in another player's home system or Mecatol Rex

name: Control the Borderlands
text: Have units in 4 systems on the edge of the game board other than your home system

name: Imperium Rex
text: Immediately end the game
